description: 日期拼接公式 — 将日/月/年列合并为完整日期

cases.name: 日期拼接 DATE 公式
cases.message: Open the file bench/external/spreadsheetbench/spreadsheetbench_verified_400/spreadsheet/52917/1_52917_init.xlsx. I need to create a formula that can combine day, month, and year data from separate columns A, B, and C into a complete date format in column J, as shown in my attached file.
